name: Coronary Flow Reserve on PET
description: This module describes the common data elements for coronary flow reserve on PET use case

attributes.name: Myocardial blood flow
attributes.description: Measure myocardial blood flow at rest and stress in each coronary artery distribution cc gm min

attributes.name: Seventeen segment coronary flow reserves
attributes.description: Calculate coronary flow reserves from myocardial blood flow for each of the AHA segment sccgmmin
